author: uetsah
message: Are you going to publish how much donations you got in total each month?

replies.author: Aurélien
replies.message: I haven't decided yet. I haven't received lots of donation for now (meaning a grand total of 1 donation as of today :) ), I will probably define a policy regarding publication if/when the number of donation gets a bit higher.
